coachLogin.description: Log in to manage your schedule, connect with students, and make an impact.

coachSignup.title: Create a Coach Account

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

checkEmail.title: Check your email
checkEmail.subtitle: We've sent a password reset link to {email}

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Please enter your new password below.

success.title: Password Reset Successfully
success.description: Your password has been reset. You can now log in with your new password.

error.invalidToken: The reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.

verifyEmail.title: Verifying Email
verifyEmail.subtitle: Please wait while we verify your email address...
verifyEmail.successDesc: Your email address has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
